name: Shadow Captain
text: Not all heroic warriors walk in the light. As a shadow captain, you know there is strength to be found in darkness. Among the lost souls, you gain the power to command shadows. Spirits carry out your wishes on the battlefield, and those forces are strong and disciplined.

features.shadowCaptain'sAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you and an ally within 5 squares of you deal 1d6 extra necrotic damage on melee attacks until the end of your next turn
features.shadow'sReconnoitering(11thLevel): Shadowy spirits constantly whisper to you, describing the unseen
features.inspiringTheInvisibleLegion(16thLevel): When you score a critical hit, the target of the attack is harried by shadows, causing the creature to grant combat advantage to any attacker until the end of your next turn

flavorText: My soldiers do not tire, thirst, or anger. If you cross me, your soul will join their ranks.
